stories.title: The Lean Startup Quest
stories.subtitle: An interactive journey through the core principles of building a business with the Lean Startup methodology. Learn about MVPs, pivoting, and validated learning.
stories.learning_concepts: Lean Startup, MVP, Pivot, Innovation Accounting

stories.title: Detective case
stories.subtitle: An interactive journey with a detictive trying to solve a mysterios case, learning about power of small achievemts along the way.
stories.learning_concepts: habit building, organizing time, Pivot, Innovation Accounting

stories.title: introvert quest
stories.subtitle: An interactive journey with an introvert who tries to have friends.
